summary: WorkerFactoryInterface method signature is missing parameters that are present in the actual implementation (ExceptionInterceptorInterface and PipelineProvider), causing a mismatch between the public interface contract and implementation.
userImpact: Users relying on the interface documentation cannot discover or use the ExceptionInterceptorInterface and PipelineProvider parameters available in the actual implementation.
rootCause: Interface method signature was not updated when implementation parameters were added, creating a contract mismatch.
proposedFix: Update WorkerFactoryInterface.newWorker() signature to include the missing ExceptionInterceptorInterface and PipelineProvider parameters with null defaults.
keyQuote: The interface should describe the full method with all arguments.
